scripts.start: PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.docker-create: doctl k8s cluster create --region fra1 --node-pool "name=tet-api;size=s-1vcpu-2gb;count=1;auto-scale=true;min-nodes=1;max-nodes=3" tet-api --wait && doctl kubernetes cluster kubeconfig save tet-api
scripts.docker-push: doctl registry login && docker tag neutrino/tet-api registry.digitalocean.com/neutrino/tet-api && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/neutrino/tet-api
scripts.docker-patch: doctl registry kubernetes-manifest | kubectl --context do-fra1-tet-api apply -f - && kubectl --context do-fra1-tet-api patch serviceaccount default -p '{"imagePullSecrets": [{"name": "registry-neutrino"}]}'
scripts.docker-secrets: kubectl --context do-fra1-tet-api create secret generic person --from-env-file=.env
scripts.docker-update: yarn run docker-build && yarn run docker-push && yarn run docker-restart
scripts.docker-install: yarn run docker-build && yarn run docker-push && yarn run docker-patch && yarn run docker-deploy && yarn run docker-serve
